dict.string:
Restore the data saved in Google Account. Log in Google Account using the button below to restore.
<font color='red'>＊ Warning ＊ In the case that a different OS is used from changing your device and such, Polygons cannot be transferred due to Store policies. Other items shown in Item List, such as Mods, Lock Keys or Tickets, also cannot be transferred.</font>

Player data found. <font color="yellow">Player name: %s Rank: %s</font>
Transfer player data?
<font color="red">CAUTION</font> Recovering previous data will cause you to lose your current game progress. Continue?
Insufficient memory. You need at least %lldMB of free space. Your game progress may be hindered.
Insufficient memory. Turn OFF High Definition Unit display to save space. OK?

<font size="28">System Match Detected</font> Welcome to the world of ALICE. Your mission: Stop the rampaging avatars. Cooperate with other players and stand up to the nasty brutes infecting the system.

<font size="28">System Match Detected</font> Welcome to the world of ALICE. Your mission: Stop the rampaging avatars. Cooperate with other players and stand up to the nasty brutes infecting the system.
Your last quest was aborted. Resume where you left off?
A new version of Crash Fever is available. Continuing to use this version may result in unexpected behaviors. Please download the latest version.
You're about to exit the app. Proceed?
Unable to move to multiplayer due to aborted data from your last game session. Delete aborted data?
You must complete the tutorial first before you can access multiplayer.
The URL is invalid. Please check to see if it's pasted incorrectly.
In order to play Crash Fever, you first need to agree to the Terms. Tap "Terms" to review the Terms. Tap "Agree" to begin the game.
You must agree to the Terms before playing Crash Fever.

RELOAD: Download graphics resource, etc. This may resolve issues where graphics do not appear. RECOVER: Download data after deleting temporary save data from aborted battles, etc. This may resolve issues such as the app not starting.
The game version has been updated. Discarding aborted data and returning to the home screen.
Please complete the tutorial before continuing.

Download required data to play. Continue?
Select「<font color = "blue">Batch</font>」 to help reduce the number of downloads during play.
Select「<font color = "green">Min.</font>」 for minimum required download. Additional downloads may be required.
<font size = '20'>Please be sure you</font> <font size = '20'>have a stable connection.</font> <font size = '20'>Due to larger file sizes</font> <font size = '20'>Wi-Fi is recommended.</font>

Downloading new data Continue?
<font size = '24'>Size: </font><font color = "red" size = '24'>%s</font>

Additional data required to play Download data?
Tap Cancel to return to the Title screen.
<font size = '24'>Size: </font><font color = "red" size = '24'>%s</font>
Complete the Tutorial to unlock the Raid.
Complete the Tutorial to unlock the Raid.

If you allow tracking, Crash Fever ads will not be displayed on other apps or websites.
If you disable tracking, you can still use Crash Fever.

◆Account Deletion Request◆
If you wish to have your account deleted, please read the Terms of Agreement below before contacting us. <font color = "red">※ You must agree to the following "Terms of Agreement" in order to delete your account. We will not be accepting any correspondence without your agreement. </font> 【Terms of Agreement】 【1】Once the account deletion process is completed, you will no longer be able to log in to the application with the same account. 【2】It may take several weeks for the deletion process to be completed after the submission of your account deletion request. 【3】Until the deletion process is completed, you will be able to continue logging in to the app after the submission of your account deletion request. 【4】<font color = "red">If you own paid items, the paid items you owned will no longer be available to you. </font>【5】<font color = "red">Please note that deleted accounts cannot be restored for any reason. </font>【6】Cancellations of account deletion will not be accepted after the request has been submitted.
If you agree to the “Terms of Agreement” above, please tap on the "Agree" button to contact us.

*Confirm*
<font color = "red">Submiting account deletion request. Cancellation is not possible after submission.</font>
Continue?

Do you wish to delete your saved data and start a new game from the beginning?
If you wish to restore your data and play, please perform a data backup before deleting.
<font color = "red">※ Deleted data can not be restored.</font>
No account has been created yet.
